Body:
We want a royalty-free embedded solution on Raspberry PI to re-sell to customers.

Is the workflow something like: 1. Develop on desktop Visual Studio

  1. Upload executable to windows IoT CORE on Raspberry PI

  2. Ship to customer.

"
My reply answer your question? Feel free point out if I have misunderstanding.

I am assume you are talking about installing app not via Microsoft Store.

You workflow is working but there are some information to share with you:

  • On Windows IoT Core, UWP is main application type supported. For non-UWP app supported and limitations you can reference here.
  • Build your customer image and preinstall your app in it
column9:
then you can complete flash image and deploy app in one step. It is efficient when you have large number of devices.

More helpful information:

Deploying an App with Visual Studio

Install your app on an IoT Core device

Update apps on your Windows 10 IoT Core devices

"
